content: Definitely! One of the strengths of literature is its ability to capture the complexities of human experience, including the struggles and challenges that we all face at some point. Characters like Holden can offer not only a window into the mind of a troubled teenager, but also a sense of shared humanity and empathy for those who may be struggling with similar issues. By exploring these themes in literature, we can gain a better understanding of ourselves and each other, and perhaps even find a sense of comfort or validation in our own struggles.
